member_organisations: IWEA's membership is available on our website at the following link http://www.iwea.com/iweamembers
fields_of_interest: Competition, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
head_office_address: Sycamore House, IWEA Millenium Park, Osberstown
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Irish Wind Energy Association (IWEA) is the national association for the wind industry in Ireland. IWEA is committed to education and awareness building to promote the use of a sustainable energy system in Ireland and thus contribute to a cleaner environment with the benefits of non fossil fuels
